```{r}
library(ggplot2)
rocket <- readr::read_csv("./data-raw/rocket.csv") %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(
    colour = forcats::as_factor(colour) %>%  forcats::fct_relevel(., "red", "ong", "ylw", "gry_dk", "blu"),
    y = 610 - y
  )

rocket_plot <- ggplot(rocket, aes(x, y, colour = colour)) +
  geom_point(size = 4) +
  scale_color_manual(values = c(red, ong, ylw, gry_dk, blu)) +
  labs(x = "Amount daddy is a 'proper scientist'", y = "Love for daddy", title = "Rocket plot") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.position = "none")

rocket_plot %>%
  ggplot2::ggsave(filename = file.path(here::here("data-raw"), "ggrocket.png"), width = 10, height = 10, unit = "cm")
  

```
